column2: Text

Congratulations to all our corporate sustainability award winners & thank you for making sustainable development part of your business DNA. Your passion & commitment let us show the world how #TaiwanCanHelp, as we strive to accomplish #SDGs. https://t.co/9ikr5iQPs9

#Taiwan’s investment partnership with the #US continues to grow. We are proud to provide a platform for innovative, leading companies to collaborate with partners around the world. @Google @Microsoft @TWSemicon  @generalelectric https://t.co/MxRzSGnLsF

It’s always a pleasure to see my friends at @AmChamTaipei, a key force driving the #Taiwan-#US economic partnership forward. I was pleased to see that their name will be changed to AmCham Taiwan & am sure there’ll be even more good news for Taiwan-US investment in the future. https://t.co/xPLJFyftNO

In the face of global challenges, #Taiwan has shown true team spirit. Thank you to everyone for keeping their heads & taking it one play at a time, giving their best for #TeamTaiwan through the #COVID19 pandemic & global economic uncertainty. https://t.co/ayW51aaLlY

I was glad to get on the phone with one of our most valued partners in the #US, @RepEliotEngel. We’re fortunate to have a friend like you, whose support has allowed us to contribute more to the int'l community. I look forward to seeing you again, whether it be in #Taiwan or #NY. https://t.co/3h02Ieaa36

On behalf of the government & the people of Taiwan, I wish Eswatini Prime Minister @AmbroseDumile a swift recovery. We must all continue to do our utmost to defeat this global pandemic. https://t.co/eh8o2ZDpiV

#HappyDiwali to all of our friends in #India🇮🇳 & around the world. We in #Taiwan🇹🇼 are shining a light for democracy & freedom, values we share with so many of you spreading joy & light this Diwali. I wish you all an incredible celebration, & remember to stay safe! https://t.co/KZSIdKuEbK

It's heartbreaking to see our neighbor impacted by such devastating natural disasters. My thoughts are with everyone who has been affected by the typhoons & flooding in the Philippines. Taiwan wishes you strength & will provide assistance during this difficult time.

I’d like to send congratulations to @JohnBricenoPUP on your election as #Belize PM & appreciation to PM Barrow for all we achieved together. #Taiwan enjoys staunch support from Belize, treasures our longstanding friendship & looks forward to continuing our close collaboration. https://t.co/oAXRTlrROL

#TaiwanCanHelp. It's not just a slogan, not just three words. It's the collective will of the people of Taiwan; it's a movement that can save so many lives across borders. No amount of obstruction or politicising public health can change this fact. https://t.co/yHuCp0APhi

Congratulations to @Vystrcil_Milos on once again being elected #Czechia senate president. You are a true friend to all of us in #Taiwan & have inspired many with your principled leadership. We wish you a successful term & everyone in Czechia well in your fight against #COVID19. https://t.co/jHFxxtKedg

Thank you Ambassador Rachel Coupaud for all you have done to promote #Taiwan-#Haiti relations. We may be bidding farewell to a good friend, but will always cherish your time in Taiwan & look forward to seeing you again in the future. https://t.co/3i0ajCmja5

The future of green energy in #Taiwan is looking bright! I joined industry experts to discuss Taiwan’s energy transition & am proud to report that we're on track to become a key partner in global #GreenEnergy supply chains. We must all come together to build a greener planet. https://t.co/S4nJslXpZr

We look forward to expanding our strong economic ties with the US at our first Economic Prosperity Partnership Dialogue. This is yet another milestone for our strategic collaboration, building a closer #Taiwan-#US partnership for a more prosperous world. https://t.co/eEF0y5Axlc

Thank you Morris Chang for once again representing #Taiwan at the @APEC Economic Leaders’ Meeting. As @TWSemicon founder, your valuable experience as a technological innovator will help us build stronger relationships & improve public healthcare in the Asia-Pacific region. https://t.co/t9wPyxD8I4

It’s always great to catch up with good friends in the #US. Thank you @SenCoryGardner for the call & your enduring support for #Taiwan. We wish you well on the next stage of your journey & look forward to welcoming you back to Taiwan in the future. https://t.co/pEumtXE3si

Thank you @pmharriskn for your message of support & call for global cooperation. The #TaiwanModel has been successful in fighting #COVID19, & we stand ready to share our public health expertise with the world. #Taiwan must be allowed to meaningfully participate in the @WHO. https://t.co/hOonIGPNQl

We agree. Public health should not be politicised, because without Taiwan’s meaningful participation in the @WHO, we cannot achieve #HealthForAll. Thank you to @usmissiongeneva for reminding the world that #Taiwan is a force for good with a voice that deserves to be heard. https://t.co/9HiAgRUZpF

#Taiwan has valuable medical experiences to offer the world, including our successful #TaiwanModel to combat #COVID19, but we have been excluded from participating in #WHA73 due to political obstruction. Taiwan's absence is a great loss for the @WHO & the world. https://t.co/tMB269fkiG

Nearly 2000 lawmakers from all over the world have voiced their support for #Taiwan’s inclusion in the @WHO. Their voices should not be ignored. #TaiwanIsHelping the world fight the pandemic & #TaiwanCanHelp the WHO achieve #HealthForAll. https://t.co/M0mxbG2ZfM

Now it is my turn to extend congratulations to @JoeBiden & @KamalaHarris on being elected President & VP-elect. The values on which we have built our relationship could not be stronger. I look fwd to working together to further our friendship, & contributions to int’l society. https://t.co/xIvit7emjH

We are so grateful to our friends in #LatinAmerica for speaking up for #Taiwan’s participation in the @WHO. The Latin American Formosa Club knows that the world will be better off if Taiwan can contribute to international organisations. https://t.co/r1l05PHJ63

コロナ禍の中でも、台湾映画は元気いっぱいです！現在開催中の第33回東京国際映画祭では、「#台湾電影ルネッサンス2020」と題する台湾映画特集で、選りすぐりの台湾映画4作品を上映しています。日本の皆さんに、映画を通して台湾にもっと触れていただきたいと思います。

🎬https://t.co/bNLklWx1jg https://t.co/MLhsiMBIE4

Congratulations to Prime Minister @ComradeRalph on your reelection. #Taiwan & #SaintVincentAndTheGrenadines have a strong & enduring partnership. We appreciate your support for our international participation & hope to keep building on our close friendship for years to come. https://t.co/in29Gwl3hE

My heart goes out to everyone affected by Hurricane Eta. Taiwan sends its deepest sympathies to our allies & friends in Central America at this difficult time. We will do our best to help those in need.

Mis pensamientos están con todas las personas afectadas por el huracán Eta. En estos momentos tan difíciles, Taiwán envía sus más sinceras condolencias a aliados y amigos en Centroamérica. Haremos todo lo que podamos para ayudar a quienes lo necesiten.

I’m delighted that our friends in #Europe are speaking up for #Taiwan! Over 600 lawmakers from 25 European countries have made their voices heard, requesting Taiwan’s participation in the @WHO. Thank you to Europe’s Formosa Club for standing with Taiwan & global health. https://t.co/eNjxEvO3vw

It’s great to know we have such good friends all over the continent of #Africa! We welcome the founding of Africa’s Formosa Club & your support for #Taiwan’s participation in the @WHO. This is an excellent platform for strengthening Taiwan’s partnerships throughout Africa. https://t.co/sasse8MTpv
News of the terror attack in Vienna has left me with a heavy heart. We in Taiwan share our sympathies with the people of Austria & all those affected during this painful time.
Thank you to our good friends in Europe for supporting #Taiwan’s inclusion in the @WHO. We all know that by allowing us to share the #TaiwanModel, #TaiwanCanHelp the world. https://t.co/lkjfqS3PST

Take a closer look at the 🎥  three crucial steps we took to contain the #COVID outbreak using the #TaiwanModel. As a responsible member of the global community, #Taiwan is committed to sharing our knowledge & experience with the world. #TaiwanCanHelp https://t.co/BKRhrZ6ZCg

Today, people in Taiwan march to show their pride & celebrate everyone’s right to love & be loved. We're grateful to be able to hold #TaiwanPride🌈during a difficult time for the world & will continue to be a beacon of human rights in Asia. For this, we can all be #ProudOfTaiwan. https://t.co/EsdbpxY9QJ
My heart goes out to all those affected by the earthquake in Turkey & Greece. The people of Taiwan have you in their thoughts, while our government is ready to offer its support.

It was my pleasure to honour these seven pioneers for their innovations & contributions to #Taiwan at @ITRI_Taiwan. I hope that their successes will continue to inspire future generations to make their mark on the world. https://t.co/bZnAH3ULv1

It has been a difficult year for everyone involved in tourism around the world, so I visited the Taipei International Travel Fair to show support for the industry. We are fortunate to be able to travel freely in #Taiwan, & grateful to see domestic tourism making a recovery. https://t.co/lngDnOLcC1
I’m deeply saddened by the news of the attack at the Notre Dame Basilica in Nice. Taiwan stands with the people of France at this trying time, & supports their values of freedom & diversity.

.@NDI deciding to set up an office in Taiwan is great news. We will give you a greater platform to promote democratic values, civil society participation & human rights in the Indo-Pacific. This is a big step in the right direction for the #Taiwan-#US partnership. https://t.co/VjDGRCGMJd

We welcome @IRIglobal’s decision to set up an office in #Taiwan, & look forward to working together to build more resilient, democratic societies. We’ve maintained friendly ties for decades & are certain your presence in Taiwan will bolster regional freedom & democracy. https://t.co/91zyYygTXs

Today we mourn the loss of Air Force Captain Chu Kuan-meng. My thoughts are with his loved ones and brothers & sisters in the military at this difficult time. We deeply appreciate his dedication to keeping Taiwan safe, & will always remember his sacrifice. https://t.co/KQBIISqEmG

It’s heartening to see such a caring show of support for our soldiers as they go through their training exercises. Some onlookers described the rumbling engine sounds as “reassuring”, making us so proud of the trust & respect our people have for the military. https://t.co/UrEK7tcQGc
President @musebiihi, glad to see our collaboration is bearing fruit. As fellow democracies, I'm sure there is a bright future ahead for the #Taiwan-#Somaliland partnership. https://t.co/cfIp6BcKLV

We are deeply grateful to everyone in our police, firefighting & coast guard services for dedicating themselves to our safety. It was my honour to visit the Taiwan Police College & speak to the talented young people on their way to becoming the heroes who keep #Taiwan safe. https://t.co/omRFtDnphn

I am proud to be part of reimagining Taiwan with @Microsoft & welcome their investment. Our collaboration is yet another step forward for the #Taiwan-#US partnership, as we reimagine supply chains & create business opportunities for a better tomorrow. https://t.co/f9F8EWsN7E

It was a pleasure to welcome new #Nicaragua ambassador to #Taiwan Mirna Mariela Rivera. We share a long history of cooperation, & are sure that by continuing to work together, we can help guide our countries towards a brighter future. https://t.co/97Cez4ao08

A good cup of coffee is what you need to get going on Monday morning, so here you go! 

Pour over / Origin: Nantou, #Taiwan / Guest Barista: Ing-wen https://t.co/vswwHAucV9

#Taiwan is home to a tapestry of unique indigenous cultures. Learning about their histories in the idyllic #Taitung county was truly eye-opening. I hope that everyone in Taiwan & around the world has a chance to learn about their stories. https://t.co/4GGruv2pAF

#Taiwan has valuable medical experience & expertise to share with the world, so I was proud to discuss our contributions with healthcare professionals at our Global Health Forum. Through int’l cooperation, I am sure we can do more to combat #COVID19 & build a healthier future. https://t.co/4V5p8NdAGB

Join me, Wan-Ji & Sho-Er to learn how to say “happy Double Ninth Festival” in #Taiwanese: Tîong-iông-tseh-khuài-lok. Have a go at saying it yourself & remember to give senior citizens the love, respect & kindness they deserve. Tell us what else you’d like to learn about #Taiwan. https://t.co/dkvebedRSC

I visited the Want Show Laundry to see octogenarian social media stars Wan-Ji and Sho-Er, famous for their creative style & youthful spirit. Their story has lifted spirits around the world during the #COVID19 pandemic, reminding us to stay young at heart. Truly inspiring! https://t.co/g9BwYJFq81

Our diplomats work hard promoting #Taiwan’s image abroad. Ensuring our int’l space is important to the Taiwanese people, regardless of politics. I’m outraged at the behavior of “uninvited guests” at our National Day reception in #Fiji & grateful to our friends for their support. https://t.co/7A8a7pTK7R

#Taiwan’s women business leaders continue to make us proud. It was my pleasure to applaud your efforts to connect Taiwan with the world & show that #TaiwanCanHelp, no matter the challenges you face. Your success is an inspiration, driving positive change at home & abroad. https://t.co/cset04FFbg

The 2020 Presidential Office projection mapping show displayed #Taiwan’s dedication to freedom & democracy. Faced with wave after wave of challenges, our people have always been resilient, & now we have a message for the world: we are #ProudOfTaiwan & you can be too. https://t.co/nIWfPtXLRI

Having lived for over a century, these elders have witnessed generational change in #Taiwan. It was my honour to listen to their stories & spend time with them, as the elderly are cherished in our society & it is our responsibility to care for them as best we can. https://t.co/oUtXfzRUnu

Thank you to each & every one of you for following me here on @Twitter. #Taiwan is making a global impact, so no matter where in the world you are, you can join me in being #ProudOfTaiwan! https://t.co/cBYb7a2yBO

People from all walks of life have contributed to our #COVID19 response. Today I thanked the Taiwan Machine Tool & Accessory Builders' Association for their hard work ramping up our face mask production. #Taiwan is now a leading face mask producer & the world has taken notice! https://t.co/pWlmsdc9oM

We’re turning #Taiwan into Asia’s green energy hub! At the 2020 Energy Taiwan Exhib. I laid out our plans to ensure a stable green energy supply & grow Taiwan’s renewable energy into a major global player. We have a vision for a greener world & are determined to see it through. https://t.co/DsyH3IhjV2

#Taiwan is lucky to be home to many Indian restaurants, & Taiwanese people love them. I always go for chana masala and naan, while #chai always takes me back to my travels in #India, and memories of a vibrant, diverse & colourful country. What are your favourite Indian dishes? https://t.co/IJbf5yZFLY

今天是我們來自台灣的棒球好手陳偉殷從美國大聯盟轉回日本職棒後第一場出賽。偉殷：不管你在哪裡打球，台灣人做你後盾! 

日本朋友們，請跟我一起為他加油!

今日は米メジャーリーグから日本プロ野球へ転身した台湾のチェン・ウェイン選手の初先発の日でした。どこで登板しようとも、台湾はいつも後ろからあなたを支えています。

日本の皆さん、ぜひ台湾のスポーツヒーローを応援してください！

Today is #Taiwan baseball star @WeiYinChen16’s first game back in the @npb after a stint in the @MLB. Wei-yin, no matter where you’re playing, Taiwan will always be behind you. We invite our Japanese friends to join us in showing your support for our Taiwanese sporting hero. https://t.co/j66SuY5OIO

I was saddened to hear the news of former President of Palau Nakamura’s passing. His legacy of promoting democracy & sustainability, as well as bringing our two nations together, will never be forgotten. My heart goes out to the people of Palau.

Here we are at the Leshan Radar Station, 2,600 meters above sea level. An essential outpost of the nation’s air defense, this station provides long-range detection & early warning capabilities so we can respond quickly to incursions by foreign aircraft & keep #Taiwan safe. https://t.co/x5FkCGBxHB

Thank you to #Nicaragua President-Commander Daniel Ortega and Vice President Rosario Murillo for your warm 🇹🇼#TaiwanNationalDay congratulations. We are grateful for the continued friendship & mutual support our countries share. https://t.co/MbcwfoVZa7

#Namaste🙏to our friends from #India 🇮🇳! Thank you for following me here. Your warm regards remind me of fond memories from time spent in your incredible country, your architectural marvels, vibrant culture & kind people are truly unforgettable. I miss my time there dearly. https://t.co/z4MzKpUbbe

My @Forum_2000 speech states that the #Taiwan-#Czechia partnership will only grow stronger over time. Because Taiwan now stands on the front line safeguarding democracy, we need support & collaboration more than ever from democracies around the world like the #CzechRepublic.

It’s my honour to open this year’s @Forum_2000 alongside so many democracy advocates from around the world. Join us online to hear me speak about #Taiwan’s commitment to democracy & our excellent relations with #Czechia. https://t.co/xDDRyY8Qz7

Delighted to welcome #Somaliland’s first Representative to #Taiwan, @AmbMohamedHagi. We look forward to strengthening bilateral cooperation between our two nations based on shared democratic values, & providing mutual support in the int'l community. https://t.co/sUcyBsi97m

Thank you @DrGiammattei for your kind 🇹🇼#TaiwanNationalDay wishes. We are grateful for your continued support as we strive to be a global beacon of freedom & democracy. Long may the friendly #Taiwan-#Guatemala partnership continue! https://t.co/lPBy6VguTZ

I & the people of #Taiwan thank @pmharriskn for your 🇹🇼#TaiwanNationalDay wishes. We treasure our friendship & common values of human rights & democracy, and are committed to working with you to promote these ideals. https://t.co/DJALLNkipv

@anagarciacarias @JuanOrlandoH @TW_Honduras @embhntw @lisandrorosales @CancilleriaHN @Taiwan_News_Ch @radioamericahn @HCHTelevDigital @Qhubotvoficial @LaTribunahn Thank you @anagarciacarias for your kind words this 🇹🇼 #TaiwanNationalDay. With support from friends like you, the #Taiwan-#Honduras partnership will only grow stronger!

Many thanks to @JuanOrlandoH for your warm wishes on Fiesta del #DobleDiez. Our shared democratic values are the foundation of a beautiful friendship, & we look forward to continuing our long-standing tradition of mutual support & #Taiwan-#Honduras cooperation. https://t.co/tAi9nptoiJ

Thank you to all of our dear friends in India 🇮🇳 for your well wishes on 🇹🇼 #TaiwanNationalDay. Together, we can take pride in safeguarding our shared values like freedom & human rights, & defending our democratic way of life. #namaste https://t.co/ZZQT1286lR

I had a wonderful evening celebrating 🇹🇼 #TaiwanNationalDay with our allies & friends at the @MOFA_Taiwan reception. Each year we share #Taiwan’s unique cuisine & culture with our friends from around the globe & thank them for their support. https://t.co/OVdRCNc1Xa

We were treated to stunning performances at this year’s 🇹🇼 #TaiwanNationalDay from so many talented artists, young people, the military & heroes of the pandemic. You all truly lit up our celebration & reminded us all why we are so #ProudOfTaiwan. https://t.co/z1iADqIUNg

I am grateful to the foreign dignitaries who wished us well this 🇹🇼 #TaiwanNationalDay. All of us in Taiwan thank you for your committed friendship & hope you enjoyed the celebrations. With your continued support, our partnerships will continue to grow from strength to strength. https://t.co/mShG1fb9dK
This is why I and our people are #ProudOfTaiwan: https://t.co/s4OdOk3oZ5

I was honoured to address the people of Taiwan & all our friends watching around the world at this year’s 🇹🇼 #TaiwanNationalDay. We can be #ProudOfTaiwan for what we have achieved this year, & should now look to the future to build a better #Taiwan & a better world.

2020 🇹🇼 #TaiwanNationalDay celebrations are underway! Our vibrant democracy will shine today through exciting performances by artists, musicians, & the military, & I'll deliver an address reflecting the will of the people. Join us via live stream here: https://t.co/MHAVO4tzfU https://t.co/oNQq5JeUkj

LIVE：2020 🇹🇼 Taiwan National Day Celebration Ceremony 

⭐10:20 President Tsai Ing-wen’s National Day Address

#ProudOfTaiwan
 https://t.co/RLOlX2vFFK

Welcome home to the thousands of overseas Taiwanese who have come back to celebrate our 🇹🇼National Day! I had a wonderful time spending the evening with so many of you & am grateful for your tireless advocacy for Taiwan. We can all be #ProudOfTaiwan wherever we are in the world! https://t.co/09zG9fMuGA

Every year on 🇹🇼 National Day, we honour our beloved country & people, people whose concerted efforts mean that we're able to gather & celebrate together in 2020, just as we do every year. The whole world can see that #Taiwan finds strength in unity. 

⭐ Join us on Oct.10 https://t.co/NrhxgtQDYZ

We thank everyone for the #TaiwanNationalDay🇹🇼 wishes we have received from around the world. On this day, we celebrate our nation’s hard-earned freedoms & democratic achievements. We invite you to join us here at @iingwen & show that you too are #ProudOfTaiwan. https://t.co/62ght5cvGd

The @yushanforum is a bridge for dialogue between #Taiwan & #Asia. I was glad to share our many successes in engaging with the region at this year’s event, & I’m sure that once we’ve got past the pandemic, we will continue to build a safer, more prosperous world together.

Our 2020 National Day light projection show is a tribute to the people of #Taiwan. It shows how we stand together to overcome challenges & serve as a beacon of hope to the world. We are truly #ProudOfTaiwan, our #IslandOfResilience. https://t.co/UwtHosLklK

I paid my final respects to our dear Former President Lee Teng-hui who was laid to rest today. His contributions to #Taiwan will never be forgotten, making us proud to have this great man watching over our democracy. https://t.co/CHy0Ksxa0k

Join me here to celebrate #Taiwan’s 🇹🇼 National Day on Oct. 10th. Watch our live stream here on @iingwen & show the world that we are all #ProudOfTaiwan.

▶️Tune in on Oct 10th beginning at 8:50AM (GMT+8)
⭐️National Day address begins at 10:20AM  (GMT+8)

Along with everyone in #Taiwan, we stand with the exceptional men & women serving in our Air Force who ensure the security & sovereignty of our country 24/7/365. Your dedication to protecting our freedom & democracy is an inspiration to us all. https://t.co/oBfNWz5kEQ
@moisejovenel My sincere condolences go out to @moisejovenel on the passing of your father. We in Taiwan are thinking of you & your family at this time, and send you our best wishes.

On October 10 we celebrate #Taiwan’s National Day & another year for our dynamic, democratic society. Although we faced great challenges this year, our people came together to meet them head on & propel Taiwan forward. This is yet another year we can be truly #ProudofTaiwan. https://t.co/MzE30J3a8p
On behalf of the government & the people of Taiwan, wishing @POTUS & @FLOTUS a swift recovery. Yes, we will get through this together. https://t.co/GtDvi3HflH

I thank all our friends in the @USSenate for supporting a #Taiwan-#US #BTA. As a longstanding economic & security partner, we are confident stronger trade ties will benefit us all. https://t.co/U2Cga7bJc4

The annual #TaiwanDesignExpo is always an eye-opener! This year artists & architects merged advanced technology and scenes from daily life, giving old urban landscapes new life. These art installations show the infinite potential of being #MadeInTaiwan. https://t.co/bYGSHd63dZ
Happy #MoonFestival! I hope that everyone celebrating cherishes this family holiday, as I always do. https://t.co/kT80ueGi1G

Taiwan appreciates #Nicaragua for speaking up for our inclusion in the @UN system at #UN75. We hope that with greater international participation, #Taiwan can make even more humanitarian contributions around the world. https://t.co/L8vpus04mU

Thank you @MFABelize for your support at #UN75! By participating in the @UN system, #Taiwan can share our successful #COVID19 response with the world & expand our global outreach. https://t.co/VheQKhlAyn

It’s great to have a trusted partner like the #US! Thank you @USAmbUN for recognising #Taiwan’s contributions to public health & economic development and supporting our inclusion in the @UN system. We know that with greater int'l participation, we can do even more for the world. https://t.co/UvBFLDRswV

We're grateful to our global allies for supporting #Taiwan’s meaningful participation in the @UN system at the #UNGA. 2020 has brought new challenges, but our commitment remains the same: we will continue to show the world that #TaiwanCanHelp achieve UN #GlobalGoals. https://t.co/63xQeUmt17

In a rapidly changing world, #Taiwan stands out as an ideal investment destination. We actively encourage international investors to capitalize on our stable economy & free, democratic society. Let’s work together to build a more prosperous world.
Taiwan has received global acclaim for our #TaiwanModel #COVID19 response and shown the world that #TaiwanCanHelp. This is our story:  🎬https://t.co/vLx6QiqX6W https://t.co/cQHvRGhJYC

Today I issued the 1000th employment gold card for foreign nationals, welcoming top international talent to #Taiwan. This program presents a golden opportunity for outstanding professionals to make their dreams come true in a dynamic economy & a diverse, democratic society. https://t.co/m6usQT1h32

We are grateful to #SaintLucia Prime Minister @allenmchastanet for supporting #Taiwan’s inclusion in global processes at #UN75. We need to be a part of discussions on climate change & the #COVID response, because we too know that #TaiwanCanHelp the world take on these challenges. https://t.co/BYG6hmFbKz

Thank you #StKittsAndNevis Prime Minister @pmharriskn for recognizing #Taiwan’s work to advance peace, prosperity & development around the globe. We are privileged to have a partner like you who knows our international participation can help the world through this difficult time. https://t.co/JPe9yoivBO

Thank you #StVincentAndTheGrenadines Prime Minister @ComradeRalph for standing up for #Taiwan & sharing our sustainable development achievements with the world at #UN75. With partners like you we hope to reach even more #SDGs, making the world a better place. https://t.co/KoQRiRH2g3
I heard our soldiers were responding to the call of duty and had to cancel their order at a drink shop at #Penghu, so I had to pay a visit & do what I need to do: https://t.co/XuA0BfvBJT

Thank you @TuvaluPM Natano for recognising #Taiwan's efforts to achieve #SDGs and supporting our participation in international organisations at #UN75. You’re right, our handling of the #COVID pandemic means that #TaiwanCanHelp the world even more if we’re given the chance. https://t.co/EsYOM1C6N1

The heroes serving in our military make valuable contributions to #Taiwan every day. No matter where you are stationed or how you serve, we recognize & appreciate the hard work you put in to keep us all safe. https://t.co/yv4SP8sJjk

It’s great to have a genuine friend like #Nauru! Thank you President Aingimea for speaking up for #Taiwan’s rights at #UN75 & telling the world about what we have to offer when it comes to responding to global issues like #COVID. https://t.co/lLb90TiCKH

We are grateful to #Haiti president @moisejovenel for supporting #Taiwan’s right to international participation at #UN75. We are proud to be your partner in your fight against #COVID & hope to be able to help more countries around the world respond to the pandemic. https://t.co/YwuuUr2iin

Late Czech Senate President Jaroslav Kubera was steadfast in his commitment to freedom & democracy, and his work to strengthen #Taiwan-#Czechia relations will never be forgotten. 國是會議的三個目標:第一、財務正常：退休保險的財務機制的健全和平衡必須落實，並且提出財務平衡的時間表，化解社會恐慌；第二、照顧公平：建立沒有歧視待遇的退休年金制度，解決社會對立，建立「三層年金制度」；第三、世代正義：要考量包括人口老化等社會變遷，不能成為下一代的負擔 #國是會議

達成非核家園需要一段社會共識產生的過程，很難說停就停。2025年是核三廠除役的時間，我們有13年的時間，可以完整規劃按部就班的完成，但更重要的是政府的執行力，不能因為「法律沒有訂時間表」，就可以兩手一攤，一副我做不到，別人也做不到的模樣
國家領導人必須有能力，面對最困難的決定，必須回應人民的恐懼，而不是把問題留給下一代。很多問題不能夠拖著不解決，所以我提出「2025非核家園」，就是要有時間表，不能讓理念停在口號，而且要把資源、能源的問題一併解決

2025非核家園的具體主張包括：
第一、核四不運轉，核一、核二、核三不延役。
第二、加速老舊火力電廠汰舊換新，提高發電、輸配電及用電效率。
第三、推動節能技術，提升再生能源比重（每年至少增加1％）。

台灣面臨了「一個台灣，兩個世界」的危機，在「贏者圈」的只有三分之一的人口，另外三分之二的人，是愈來愈多的失業、低薪及貧窮人口，和弱勢家庭及看不見未來的下一代。他的所得沒有成長，甚至於在下降。這個現象也讓大家感到心痛，也認為一個國家領導人，必須要面對這項情勢。
第三場政見發表會-蔡英文結論全文  http://goo.gl/7MTnh 蔡英文：不管風風雨雨，相互信任的一顆心，才是民進黨浴火重生的最大力量，也是民進黨可以作為偉大政黨的傳承。我可以很驕傲的說：許信良主席、蘇貞昌院長，還有我蔡英文，我們都是民主進步黨。
福利的照養，必須結合在地，必須結合人民的生活，必須有一定程度的地區化。而我們的照顧體系，必須要由政府提出供給，必須給予中層或下層民眾品質確保、價格合理的照顧，甚至給予弱勢者免費的照顧，因此我認為我們的社會安全體系要做到三個「在地」-在地教育、在地就養、在地就業
第三場總統初選政見發表會-蔡英文申論全文 http://goo.gl/HkkgM 我們必須建構一個現代的、有效率的社會安全體系，社會福利是一個完整的安全體系建構，這必須要有就業安全、必須要讓教育普及而且公平，必須要有一個完整的照養體系。
今天（4/16）1400-1600將舉行http://goo.gl/ZN8eF 民進黨總統初選第三場政見發表會，歡迎鎖定年代新聞台及 http://www.nexttv.com.tw/index/news 壹電視新聞台網路直播。
蔡英文說：我們還需要用更多的力量，去維護所有「性別弱勢者」的人權。我會盡一切的力量，讓性別壓迫在台灣消失。我會帶領台灣，成為一個尊重人權、多元包容的國家。我會讓所有弱勢者，和大家一樣平等的活在這塊土地，尊嚴而幸福。我相信，這也是你我的國家願景，我們理想的台灣。
http://0rz.tw/nDPRf (蔡英文：讓台灣成為一個尊重人權、多元包容的國家 )  蔡英文說：我不想回答施明德的問題。我絕對不會這樣做，因為如果我回答了，就等於是承認他有質疑任何人的權力，我反而會成為助長「性別壓迫」的幫兇。

只要觀念改變，城鄉差距就會改變，南北差距也會改變，很多城鄉落差都會減少，甚至鄉村的就業機會將更多元，鄉村的收入也會增加；因為鄉村就變成農業、創新、文學或文化蘊育等面向的集合體，在這種情況下，人民就不必然都要住在都市，且以現在的交通及通訊的條件，人民必須開始翻轉思考。
其實很多農村及鄉村才是蘊育文化的開始，因為不論是文學創作、藝術或攝影，其實都需要情境與場地。蔡英文說，不論是追求創新產業或是高質的農村或鄉村生活，其實都要打破一個觀念就是「為什麼我們做什麼事都要在都市裡？」、「為什麼年輕人都要到都市？」
台灣社會累積很多問題，如果我們日復一日依舊用短期的政策處理長期的問題，用片段的政策處理整體性的問題，那問題將繼續累積下去，也會造成台灣經濟發展停滯不前。

首投ing！一定要有你！ http://j.mp/eR0zob 3月23日星期三上午11:00，蔡英文將至民進黨中央黨部領表並登記。當天需要19-23歲，這次有機會投票的「首投族」來為蔡英文加油。請至 http://j.mp/eR0zob 登記，這次一定要有你！
「平安日本」募款行動 http://j.mp/hZrRVP 在此要為日本受難民眾致上最深的哀悼，更祈願日本儘速重建、人民生活能早日恢復。並呼籲全國人民踴躍捐輸，協助他們度過難關。
我們要找出「擺脫核能依賴的發展策略」，這需要重新調整能源和產業的結構。我知道這不容易，但我們不能像現在的政府一樣什麼都不做，核一、核二及核四都在首都旁邊，日本的核災發生在這裡，台灣將會癱瘓。我要呼籲政府不要麻木不仁，也呼籲人民一起關心核電安全議題，台灣一定要盡速成為「非核家園」
另外，台灣發展從農業邁入資本社會型態後，政經結構並沒有跟著轉變，留下許多問題，像是鄉村和都市、南北、農工的落差。我認為，農業在台灣發展要重新定義，居住在鄉村不一定是種田，可能是創新、研發者或作家，居住模式和經濟活動要活化，才能減少這些落差
今天提出「首都解壓」的概念，在未來，台灣必須創造另一個政經中心，如果各種產業活動一直往北移，區域不公平的現象會繼續惡化，新型態產業應該到中南部，才能平衡收入，縮小城鄉差距。
柯總召並未主張要緩徵奢侈稅，他主張奢侈稅應如期開徵 http://j.mp/ifG2g2 黨團表示，《工商時報》的「奢侈稅暫緩，有譜」標題，與柯總召發言之內容不符，甚有誤導讀者之虞，黨團與柯總召深感遺憾。
游前院長認為，台灣的地位不應只是中國的台灣，而是世界的台灣。台灣的未來領導人不能眼中只有中國，台灣未來需要一位能夠處理全球化問題的國家領導人。 http://j.mp/fLoz8k 游錫堃：蔡英文是未來能夠處理全球化問題的國家領導人
李前總統勉蔡英文發揮龍馬精神 讓台灣向前發展 http://j.mp/igLTqg 李前總統特別鼓勵蔡英文，表示台灣人在國際現況艱困的當下，唯有運用聯合與團結才能讓台灣向前發展。
外賓相當關切台灣防衛與安全議題，蔡英文認為，安全感可分為兩個層面。第一個是人民對維持主權與現狀的安全感，包括台灣自我防衛的能力與決心。另一個層面是經濟與社會地位的安全感，台灣社會日益擴大的貧富差距，以及資源分配不均引發的種種問題，也讓人民對政府失去信心。
與外賓交流國際重大議題 蔡英文：政府應提出完整災變計畫 http://j.mp/fS58WF 政府不應該輕忽核能安全的嚴重性，應防患未然，就台灣現有的核能設施進行縝密的安全設計與品質的確認，並提出完整的災變疏散計畫。這尤其對於人口密集的台灣是非常嚴肅的課題。
政壇常有馬英九和蔡英文同質性高說法，蔡英文強調自己強韌度和馬差很多，政策能力也較強，對於土地的認同更是不同：「馬父親馬鶴凌骨灰罈上寫的是化獨漸統，可是我父親墓碑上寫楓港。」「他的家庭背景某一定程度會影響他的認同，我們的認同是不一樣的，我們認為自己的根在哪是最重要的。」
對於總統府批評參選演說空洞、無具體政策，蔡英文說，她的演講已經表達很多政策價值了，蔡英文認為，總統府還停留在制式的思考，「你不是在選部長，也不是選常任次長，而是在選一個國家領導人。」
